1370: Pietersen was born in Die Coninc straet in 1370.
Got married to Jacob at age 18 in 1370.
Gave birth to Siwa in 1370 at age 18.
1371: Gave birth to Lutghardis in 1371 at age 19.
Lost daughter Lutghardis when Lutghardis was 1 years old.
1374: Gave birth to Brame in 1374 at age 22.
1375: Gave birth to Marcibilia in 1375 at age 23.
1379: Gave birth to Badeloghen in 1379 at age 27.
1381: Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 3 years old.
1383: Lost daughter Marcibilia when Marcibilia was 9 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1397: Lost daughter Siwa when Siwa was 28 years old.
